org.qbroker.monitor

Class ConfigList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.monitor.ConfigList

  • public class ConfigList
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigList manages a list of configuration properties for various objects. It contains a property monitor to download the configurations for all the items of the list from a repository or a data source. Each downloaded configuration has two identifiers, a unique id as the item in the list and a unique name as the key for the object. ConfigList provides a set of methods to maintain and manage these configurations.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
